item.title: 芬兰第三季度经济增长显示经济复苏在望
item.description: 芬兰第三季度的经济增长与早先的预测基本一致，这证实了这个北欧国家正走在复苏的道路上，预计明年将加快步伐。【原文：Finland’s economy grew largely in line with earlier projections in the third quarter, confirming the Nordic nation is on a path to recovery that’s expected to pick up pace next year.】

item.title: 南非股市反弹取决于盈利预期是否超预期
item.description: 南非股市需要超越不断上升的盈利预期，才能将创纪录的涨势延续到 2025 年。但并非所有投资者都相信他们能做到。【原文：South African stocks need to beat rising earnings expectations to prolong their record-setting rally into 2025. Not all investors are convinced they can.】

item.title: 据说 Orkla 考虑 4 亿美元上市印度业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，挪威奥克拉公司（Orkla ASA）正在考虑明年对其印度业务进行首次公开募股，募集资金可能高达4亿美元。【原文：Norway’s Orkla ASA is considering an initial public offering of its Indian business next year that could raise as much as $400 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德里空气污染严重，印度仍削减汽车廉价汽油供应
item.description: 印度正在削减廉价车用天然气的供应，因为印度正努力应对国内生产短缺的问题，此举可能会加剧包括新德里在内的大城市的有毒空气问题。【原文：India is cutting back its supply of cheap gas for vehicles as it struggles to cope with domestic production shortages, a move that could add to toxic air woes in major cities including New Delhi.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选刺激消费，印度 IT 股表现突出
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普的回归引发了美元走强和技术外包增加的预期，印度大型 IT 服务提供商的股票在近期反弹后有望进一步上扬，与其他行业的疲软情绪背道而驰。【原文：Large Indian IT service providers’ stocks are poised for a further run-up after a recent rally, bucking the weak sentiment in other sectors as Donald Trump’s return generates expectations of a stronger dollar and greater tech outsourcing.】

item.title: 关键会议前刺激政策押注推动中国股市走高
item.description: 中国股市本周第二次反弹，交易员们认为，12 月份的关键政策会议有望为经济提供更多支持。【原文：Chinese stocks rallied for the second time this week with traders pointing to expectations for greater economic support at a key policy meeting in December.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦自 2022 年以来首次在坚戈贬值后上调利率
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦自 2022 年以来首次提高利率，因为人们担心本国货币疲软将刺激通货膨胀再次加速。【原文：Kazakhstan lifted interest rates for the first time since 2022 amid concerns that a weakening national currency will spur another acceleration in inflation.】

item.title: Sea 盈利 430 亿美元后引来分析师看涨呼声
item.description: Sea Ltd.在电子商务领域恢复盈利后，分析师更加看好其股票，今年迄今为止，该公司的市值已增加了 430 亿美元。【原文：A return to profitability in e-commerce for Sea Ltd. has analysts turning even more bullish on its stock after a rally that has added $43 billion to its market value so far this year.】

item.title: Argonaut 的 Barry Norris 说要投资阿根廷和美国
item.description:
这位英国金融界的资深人士谴责英国工党的税收政策，同时指出了美洲的机遇。【原文：

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商在欧洲关税风波中进一步下滑
item.description: 中国汽车制造商进军欧洲电动汽车市场继续遭遇阻力，在新关税实施前的10月份，中国汽车制造商在欧洲的交付份额有所下滑。【原文：Chinese carmakers’ push into the European electric-vehicle market continued to meet resistance, with their share of deliveries to the region slipping during October in the run-up to new tariffs.】

item.title: 加纳利率决定悬而未决，通胀改变方向
item.description: 对于加纳央行在下月大选前是延长宽松周期还是维持关键利率不变，经济学家意见不一。【原文：Economists are divided over whether Ghana’s central bank will extend its easing cycle or leave the key interest rate unchanged ahead of elections next month.】

item.title: 汇丰银行大中华区贷款银团业务主管苏艳芳退休
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司大中华区银团贷款业务主管 Anita So 即将退休。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s head of loan syndications for Greater China, Anita So, is retiring after a 36-year career in banking, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 送货英雄将塔拉巴特的最终 IPO 价格定在区间顶部
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 将其中东子公司的首次公开募股价格定在了区间的最高点，使该交易有望成为阿拉伯联合酋长国今年最大的上市交易。【原文：Delivery Hero SE set the price for its Middle Eastern unit’s initial public offering at the top of its range, putting the deal on pace to be the United Arab Emirates’ biggest listing of the year.】

item.title: 澳新银行丑闻后，澳大利亚债务管理机构考虑改变拍卖方式
item.description: 澳大利亚债务主管表示，去年在一次140亿澳元（约合91亿美元）的政府债券销售中存在操纵市场的指控，这导致澳大利亚立即收紧了相关规定，并可能导致资金筹集方式发生长期变化。【原文：Allegations of market manipulation at an A$14 billion ($9.1 billion) sale of a government bond last year brought about an immediate tightening of rules in Australia and may lead to longer-term changes in the way funds are raised, the nation’s debt chief said.】

item.title: 日本央行 12 月加息押注增加，日本企业急于抛售债券
item.description: 由于越来越多的人猜测日本央行可能在下个月再次加息，日本企业借款人正在加快出售债券的步伐。【原文：Japanese corporate borrowers are selling bonds at a faster pace as speculation grows the Bank of Japan may raise interest rates again next month.】

item.title: 经济增长放缓，印尼股市走向调整
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国大选中获胜后，经济增长放缓和地区不确定性导致印尼基准股指从年内高点下跌约 10%，从而引发技术性调整。【原文：Indonesia’s benchmark stock index fell about 10% from its year’s high, heading for a technical correction brought on by slowing economic growth and regional uncertainties after Donald Trump’s win in the US election.】

item.title: 印度债券自纳入指数以来首次出现月度流出
item.description: 由于美元走强削弱了人们对卢比债券的兴趣，有资格被纳入全球债券的印度主权债券将出现自6月份被纳入摩根大通指数以来的首次月度资金外流。【原文：Indian sovereign bonds eligible for global bond inclusion are set to see their first monthly outflow since getting added to JPMorgan Chase and Co.’s index in June, as a stronger dollar has eroded interest in rupee debt.】

item.title: 自 2023 年初以来，Nifty 指数首次出现连续月度跌幅
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国恢复深圳至香港的多次入境签证
item.description: 中国放宽了深圳居民赴港旅游的签证规定，允许深圳居民在一年内无限次赴港旅游，而不是以前的每周一次。【原文：China has eased visa rules for Shenzhen residents traveling to Hong Kong, allowing unlimited visits within a year instead of the previous one-trip-per-week limit.】

item.title: 华尔街宏观交易员将迎来自大流行病以来最糟糕的一年
item.description: 受利润率紧缩和宏观经济形势严峻的影响，全球银行的外汇和利率交易收入将创下自大流行病以来的最低纪录。【原文：The world’s banks are on track to report the lowest revenue from foreign-exchange and rates trading since the pandemic, hit by tighter margins and a challenging macroeconomic backdrop.】

item.title: 特朗普交易受质疑，美元将创八月以来最差一周
item.description: 由于投资者开始质疑自美国大选以来推动美元上涨的所谓特朗普交易，美元正走向三个月来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：The dollar is heading for its biggest weekly loss in three months as investors start to question the so-called Trump trade that has driven gains in the currency since the US election.】

item.title: 日元跌破 150 点关键水平，对缩小收益率差距的押注增加
item.description: 日元兑美元涨幅扩大，突破了 150 这一关键心理价位，因为市场认为下个月美日收益率差距缩小的可能性更大。【原文：The yen extended gains through the key psychological level of 150 against the dollar as the market priced in a greater chance of the yield gap between the US and Japan narrowing next month.】

item.title: 尽管股票资金外流，全球基金仍在印度发现亮点
item.description: 尽管上个月印度本地股票的流出量创下了新高，但海外投资者仍在印度发现了机会，这预示着特定行业的潜力。【原文：Overseas investors are finding opportunities in India despite record outflows from local shares last month, signaling potential in specific sectors.】

item.title: 经济学家称澳大利亚央行改革增加了利率路径的不确定性
item.description: 澳大利亚在深夜出人意料地通过了一项立法，将储备银行的董事会拆分为两个实体，这可能会为储备银行透露类似美联储的投票结果铺平道路，同时也会增加未来利率走势的不确定性。【原文：Australia’s surprise late-night passage of legislation that will split the Reserve Bank’s board into two entities may pave the way for it to reveal votes similar to the Federal Reserve, while also raising uncertainty over the future path of interest rates.】

item.title: 澳新银行在鹰派讲话后表示，澳大利亚央行的宽松周期将较浅
item.description: 澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）在储备银行行长警告核心通胀率仍然过高，短期内无法考虑降息后表示，澳大利亚的宽松周期将比之前预期的开始得更晚，也更浅。【原文：Australia’s easing cycle will begin later and prove shallower than previously anticipated, ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. said after the Reserve Bank chief warned that core inflation is still too high to consider interest-rate cuts in the near term.】

item.title: 美国比特币 ETF 因特朗普乐观情绪而创下月度流入纪录
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币的支持下，数字资产历史性地飙升至10万美元，受此推动，由十几只美国比特币交易所交易基金组成的集团即将创下月净流入纪录。【原文：A group of one dozen US Bitcoin exchange-traded funds is on the cusp of a record monthly net inflow, bolstered by the digital asset’s historic surge toward $100,000 on President-elect Donald Trump’s embrace of crypto.】

item.title: 印度工资下降挤压城市中产阶级和经济
item.description: 由于消费者削减开支，企业利润下滑，印度上季度工资自大流行病以来首次出现萎缩，从而抑制了经济的高速发展。【原文：Indian wages contracted last quarter for the first time since the pandemic, curbing the economy’s breakneck speed as consumers cut spending and corporate profits slump.】

item.title: 黄金走势平稳，美联储加息路径和乌克兰风险成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于美国正值感恩节假期，投资者在权衡美联储降息前景和乌克兰日益加剧的紧张局势后，在交投清淡的情况下，黄金持稳。【原文：Gold was steady amid thin trading due to the Thanksgiving holiday in the US, with investors weighing the outlook for Federal Reserve rate cuts and rising tensions in Ukraine.】

item.title: 日本银行坚持与阿达尼合作，杰富瑞和巴克莱审查合作关系
item.description: 尽管受到美国贿赂指控，日本最大的银行仍计划与亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）保持联系。【原文：Japan’s biggest banks plan to maintain ties to billionaire Gautam Adani despite US bribery charges, even as other global firms including Barclays Plc are reassessing their exposure to the Indian conglomerate.】
